content: spike stitch baskets **pdf crochet pattern** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free version of this crochet pattern these spike stitch baskets are so fun to make they re perfect for holding items making them both functional and decorative this pattern includes 2 sizes of baskets to make as well as instructions to help you change the size to the width and height you desire the larger basket is 6 tall and has a diameter of 7 while the smaller basket 4 5 tall and has diameter of 4 5 this crochet pattern is easy to follow and beginner-friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheters i hope you enjoy making these baskets as much as i did materials bulky weight yarn i used bernat maker home decrease yarn for this basket see the gauge in the pattern for yarn substitutions 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle for weaving in ends you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
